head.title: Reliable Roof Repairs | RMR Construction & Remodeling
head.description: Trust RMR Construction & Remodeling for expert roof repairs in El Dorado, Placer, and Sacramento Counties. Since 1989, we've delivered durable solutions using quality materials like asphalt shingles, metal roofing, and slate tile. Schedule a repair today!
head.keywords: roof repairs, reliable roof repair services, storm damage repair, Northern California roofing, RMR Construction & Remodeling, Placer County roof repair, El Dorado roofing solutions, asphalt shingles, slate tile roofing, metal roofing, preventative roof maintenance, gutter care, roof inspections
